suppress.notes: Suppressing as it's a false positive (see: https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258)
CVE is a json vulnerability for Node projects. False positive reported at https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/2794

These CVE's are coming from Dhowden tag library and it impacts only MP3/MP4/OGG/FLAC metadata parsing library. Also it is declared as false positive in (https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/3043)
